Title: Weird as You
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Coleman Herbert, Chad Feehan (executive story editor), Coleman Herbert (executive story editor), Scott Teems (story)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel continues to search for answers while Jon Stern has an enlightening conversation with D.A. Sondra Person. Senator Foulkes forces Sheriff Daggett to help him with an unpleasant task. Amantha bonds with a coworker at Thrifty Town.
